::SnowCat::

She watched the dinobot walk into the Ark.  She looked at the shuttle 
as it landed and hoped that they would be able to help them rescue 
Striker and Spears.  She felt a jolt of pain run up her shoulder, but 
she tried to ignore it.  They had bigger problems to deal with.  The 
pain could wait.  She waited to see the bots step off the shuttle. 

She turned and looked at Ratchet, "I don't suppose we have any 
weapons left on the Ark do we?  We will need all the weapons and ammo 
we can get.  Also,  when we go out fot the rescue mission,  we will 
need to leave a few here to protect the ship.  We can't leave it 
totally unguarded."  She then looked back over at the shuttle.  She 
knew that once it landed and a head count was conducted, they would 
have to form a plan.  Then they would need to go to the CYbertron 
Fire to see if they had a few bots they could loan out for 
reenforcements.
